metadata.description: In rural New England, a hiker is infected with an anciet curse days before his ten-year high school reunion. If his soul is pure he will be able to resist its bloodlust, it not... nothing will be able to stop him! Created by veteran storytellers Shannon Eric Denton (Graveslinger), Keith Giffen (Justice League), and Steve Niles (30 Days of Night), Gutwrencher features dynamic art by Anthony Hightower.
metadata.name: Gutwrencher (IDW)
